channel.title: Reverting back to 1.3
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers, As my client is now 1.4.5 I want to reverse back to 1.3 so I can play the server. I know how to revert but when i download the minecraft jar file it gives me an error in winrar so I can't log in to a server. If anyone can post his full bin folder please do it so I'm able to play again.
thanks in advance, halflive9
